headline: Corrections
abstract: Corrections that appeared in print on Wednesday, Jan. 1, 2020.
lead_paragraph: An “On This Day in History” item on Tuesday about the installation of lampposts in a town using new electric technology developed by Thomas Edison misidentified the town. It was Menlo Park, N.J., not Menlo Park, Calif. It also misstated the year of the event. It was 1879, not 1908.
